description: These group of app are as good as the commercial programs like Microsoft Office Professional, It has dedicated people who keep this group of programs trouble free. It has really great templates which make these group of programs exceptional value. They are backwards compatible with Microsoft Office professional programs and they except Microsoft Office templates as well. Value for money these apps leave Microsoft Office products like office 365, office & office 2016, for dead
summary: This is an extremely good app,

description:
Es muy difícil trabajar con imágenes y texto en LibreOffice Writer.
No se logra encuadrar bien y se desarma todo el diseño cuando se quiere mover una imagen.
LibreOffice is THE BEST FREE SOFTWARE OFFICE SUITE. It works correctly on openSUSE Leap 15.2 and Tumbleweed.
